changeSet.author: WilliamWelling
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ${database.defaultSchemaName}.snapshots_lb SELECT id, (jsonb->>'status')::${database.defaultSchemaName}.job_execution_status AS status, (jsonb->>'processingStartedDate')::timestamptz AS processing_started_date, (jsonb->'metadata'->>'createdByUserId')::uuid AS created_by_user_id, (jsonb->'metadata'->>'createdDate')::timestamptz AS created_date, (jsonb->'metadata'->>'updatedByUserId')::uuid AS updated_by_user_id, (jsonb->'metadata'->>'updatedDate')::timestamptz AS updated_date FROM ${database.defaultSchemaName}.snapshots;

changeSet.author: WilliamWelling
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ${database.defaultSchemaName}.snapshots_lb ( id, status, created_date, updated_date ) SELECT DISTINCT (jsonb->>'snapshotId')::uuid AS id, ('COMMITTED')::${database.defaultSchemaName}.job_execution_status AS status, now() AS created_date, now() AS updated_date FROM ${database.defaultSchemaName}.records WHERE (jsonb->>'snapshotId')::uuid NOT IN ( SELECT id FROM ${database.defaultSchemaName}.snapshots_lb );
